TitleEnglish: The Children's Heroes of the Bible
SummaryEnglish: This Award Winning series is full of delightfully animated Bible stories for children. 13 stories in all provide a scripturally faithful representation of the Bible. These fascinating short films begin with six Old Testament Heroes: Joseph, Moses, David, Elijah, Esther and Jeremiah. There are seven films on New Testament Heroes, including five films devoted to Jesus and one each for The Apostles and Paul. Recommended for ages 3-8 and grown-up kids who enjoy revisiting the teachings of the Bible in an animated format. This very entertaining and educational series contains stories that your children will always remember. A winner of the “Award for Excellence” from the FILM ADVISORY BOARD.

1.SummaryEnglish: Witness the story of Joseph as his brothers sell him into slavery in Egypt, where he eventually becomes a ruler.

2.SummaryEnglish: See the infant Moses grow into manhood in the Egyptian court and later save his people.

3.SummaryEnglish: A young Jewish shepherd boy battles the Philistine giant Goliath, and becomes a hero to all of Israel.

4.SummaryEnglish: See God help the prophet Elijah perform miracles before the people, as they soon turn away from Baal and worship God.

5.SummaryEnglish: See Jeremiah’s prophecies that warned the Israelites against worshipping Baal and other false gods.

6.SummaryEnglish: Watch as the Queen of Persia risks her life to save her people.

1.SummaryEnglish: See Mary and Joseph's journey to Bethlehem, where Jesus is born; Angel of the Lord appears to the shepherds and the Wisemen bring baby Jesus gifts.

2.SummaryEnglish: See Mary, Joseph and Jesus escape to Egypt, Jesus get baptized by John the Baptist, the tale of the Good Samaritan, and more!

3.SummaryEnglish: See Jesus turn water into wine, fill the fisherman's nets with fish, share the parable of the Prodigal Son and more!

4.SummaryEnglish: See the Pharisees, Lazarus returning from the dead, the Last Supper, Jesus betrayed by Judas, Jesus before Pontius Pilot and more!

5.SummaryEnglish: See Peter's denial of Jesus three times, the trial before the Sanhedrin, Jesus carrying the cross to Calvary, His crucifixion and resurrection.

6.SummaryEnglish: Watch as Jesus is seen on the seashore and calls the fishermen to become "fishers of men."

7.SummaryEnglish: See Paul being persecuted as he refuses to denounce Christ, he spends most of the rest of his life in prison but never loses faith.
